property.name: text
property.value:
Start with executionTime = 0 and make sure it works, then increase it. May run into problems with the Continuous Director inside the arm model. Keep increasing the delay until something breaks and then analyze.
May also want to look at ThreadedComposite actor. There's a technical report that describes it.

entity.name: CatchUpComposite
entity.doc: Composite actor where inside can catch up with the outside

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
